details.description_text: Sreyansh healthcaretm blue berry body cream is prepared with the refreshing extracts of blue berry and exfoliating granules which cleanse our skin cells by eliminating dead and dry skin impurities. It nourishes and provides moisture to your body by keeping it hydrated leaves your skin feeling nourished and moisturized. Skin is the first defense of the body therefore it is necessary to keep the skin bacteria free, hygienic and clean. Body scrub can play very important part in keeping the skin clean by removing unwanted dead cell from the body, improving the circulatory system so that impurities and toxins are removed regularly from the body. Just use the body scrub twice or thrice a week in summers or winters and feel refreshed. Take the blue berry cream in your palm along with few drops of water or dry and apply to vulnerable areas like underarms, elbows, knees and feet and rub gently in cyclic motion until the scales of skin comes out. Just see the complexion of your skin immediately after the use and feel refreshed and cleansed. Blue berry extracts are highly rich in anti-oxidative properties and tone the skin. Also helps in removal of dead skin. It also improves the circulation of the skin and reverses the signs of aging like wrinkles, dry skin and age spots etc walnut shell scrub particles - the hard nut products naturally soft skin. The advantages of exfoliating have been recognized now and they are very important in preparing the skin for moisturisation and anti-age treatments. Immediate results of skin brightening are seen using the walnut scrub.
